title: 148862966.i Type At 81 Words Per Minute
excerpt: Does how fast you type relate to how good a writer you are?

children.text: Does how fast you type relate to how good a writer you are?
How about how fast you learn?
Does it make you a better learner? Or more productive team player?
Or consider how many mistakes you make starting out? Is this a good way to determine how well you’ll perform in 6 months or 6 years?
It’s fine to measure something if it’s an honest indicator (or predictor) of your performance.
But too often, it’s merely a false front.
